name: .VR File Extension
summary: Learn about .VR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A VR file is a project created by VR Studio, a program used to create, edit, and publish virtual reality (VR) videos and photos. It contains a project, which includes video and audio files and metadata. VR files are created from video captured by the Vuze VR camera developed by HumanEyes.

content: When you save a project in VR Studio, the application creates a VR file to store the project's contents. VR Studio allows you to crop video, apply edits, add panoramic effects, adjust volume levels, and more. All of these edits are stored in the VR file as text that can be read by the program so when the VR file is opened the project will be the same as when you saved and closed it before.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
